119 
120 // Return the number of vertices
124 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolyhedronMesh::getNbVertices() const {
125  return mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbVertices();
126 }
127 
128 // Return the number of faces
132 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 PolyhedronMesh::getNbFaces() const {
133  return mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbFaces();
134 }
135 
136 // Return a face normal
141 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 PolyhedronMesh::getFaceNormal(uint32 faceIndex) const {
142  assert(faceIndex < mHalfEdgeStructure.getNbFaces());
143  return mFacesNormals[faceIndex];
144 }
145 
146 // Return the half-edge structure of the mesh
150 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure& PolyhedronMesh::getHalfEdgeStructure() const {
151  return mHalfEdgeStructure;
152 }
153 
154 // Return the centroid of the polyhedron
158 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 PolyhedronMesh::getCentroid() const {
159  return mCentroid;
160 }
161 
162 }
163
